H0.text: Carbon is the element present in all organic molecules.

H1.text: Oxygen is the element present in all organic molecules.

H2.text: Sodium is present in all organic molecules.

H3.text: Hydrogen is present in all organic molecules.

A4.text: The modern meaning of organic compound is any compound that contains a significant amount of carbonâ€”even though many of the organic compounds known today have no connection to any substance found in living organisms.

A5.text: Nickel tetracarbonyl (Ni(CO)4) is typically classified as an organometallic compound.
